item.title: Morning Bid: Stocks drift lower again, India CPI on deck
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.
item.content:encoded: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: Advance Auto Parts to add three board members as activist investors take stake
item.description: Advance Auto Parts is appointing three new board members after hedge funds Third Point LLC and Saddle Point Management took positions in the automotive afterparts provider, the company said.
item.content:encoded: Advance Auto Parts is appointing three new board members after hedge funds Third Point LLC and Saddle Point Management took positions in the automotive afterparts provider, the company said.
